no.ntnu.stud.ubilearn.models

Class TrainingHouse

  • java.lang.Object
    • no.ntnu.stud.ubilearn.models.TrainingHouse

  • public class TrainingHouse
extends java.lang.Object
    This class represents a house in the training part of the application.

    • Constructor Detail

      • TrainingHouse

        public TrainingHouse()
        The default constructor for this class.

      • TrainingHouse

        public TrainingHouse(java.lang.String name,
             boolean isComplete,
             int userScore,
             int maxScore)
        Creates an instance of this class.
        Parameters:
        name - - The name of this house.
        isCompleted - - Indicates whether this house is Completed or not. A house is "Completed" when the user has managed 75% or more of the questions for the house.
        userScore - - The score the user has achieved for this house.
        maxScore - - The maximum score possible for this house.

    • Method Detail

        Returns the "Completed" status for this house.
        Returns:
